components.name: Bridge Between
components.description: Udyr has four basic Abilities that swap between Stances and can Recast an Ability to renew it with additional benefits. Additionally, after using an Ability, Udyr's next two Attacks gain Attack Speed.

components.name: Wilding Claw
components.description:
Claw Stance: Udyr gains @AttackSpeedBase@% Attack Speed and his Attacks deal @OnHitDamage@ physical damage %i:OnHit% On-Hit for @AttackSpeedDurationBase@ seconds. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks in this stance deal a bonus @MaxHPOnHit1@ max Health physical damage.

Awaken: Gain an additional @EmpoweredBonusAS@ Attack Speed and Udyr's next two Attacks call lightning six times, dealing a total of @EmpoweredLightningBonusMax@ max Health magic damage to isolated targets (strikes bounce to other nearby targets when possible).

components.name: Wilding Claw (Awakened)
components.description:
Claw Stance: Udyr gains @AttackSpeedBase@% Attack Speed and his Attacks deal @OnHitDamage@ physical damage %i:OnHit% On-Hit for @AttackSpeedDurationBase@ seconds. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks in this stance deal a bonus @MaxHPOnHit1@ max Health physical damage.

Awaken: Gain an additional @EmpoweredBonusAS@ Attack Speed and Udyr's next two Attacks call lightning six times, dealing a total of @EmpoweredLightningBonusMax@ max Health magic damage to isolated targets (strikes bounce to other nearby targets when possible).

components.name: Iron Mantle
components.description:
Mantle Stance: Udyr gains @TotalShield@ Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks gain @LifeSteal@% Life Steal and restore @LifeOnHit@ Health.

Awaken: Gain @ShieldAwakened@ Shield, restore @HealAwakened@ Health over @ShieldDuration@ seconds, and Udyr's next two Attacks instead have @LifeStealAwakened@% Life Steal and restore @LifeOnHitAwakened@ Health.

components.name: Iron Mantle (Awakened)
components.description:
Mantle Stance: Udyr gains @TotalShield@ Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks gain @LifeSteal@% Life Steal and restore @LifeOnHit@ Health.

Awaken: Gain @ShieldAwakened@ Shield, restore @HealAwakened@ Health over @ShieldDuration@ seconds, and Udyr's next two Attacks instead have @LifeStealAwakened@% Life Steal and restore @LifeOnHitAwakened@ Health.

components.name: Blazing Stampede
components.description:
Stampede Stance: Udyr gains @MoveSpeed@% Move Speed, decaying over @MoveSpeedDuration@ seconds. Additionally, Udyr's Attacks dash him to the target and Stun for @StunDuration@ seconds (@ICD@ second Cooldown per target).

Awaken: Grants immunity to Immobilizing and Disabling effects and an additional @MoveSpeedBonus@ Move Speed for @UnstoppableDuration@ seconds.

components.name: Blazing Stampede (Awakened)
components.description:
Stampede Stance: Udyr gains @MoveSpeed@% Move Speed, decaying over @MoveSpeedDuration@ seconds. Additionally, Udyr's Attacks dash him to the target and Stun for @StunDuration@ seconds (@ICD@ second Cooldown per target).

Awaken: Grants immunity to Immobilizing and Disabling effects and an additional @MoveSpeedBonus@ Move Speed for @UnstoppableDuration@ seconds.

components.name: Wingborne Storm
components.description:
Storm Stance: Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm for @BuffDuration@ seconds, dealing @StormDamage@ magic damage per second to nearby enemies and Slowing them by @SlowPotency@%. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks in this stance deal @PulseDamage@ magic damage to enemies in the storm.

Awaken: Unleash the storm, causing it to follow Udyr's last Attacked enemy, deal an additional @PercentHPBlast@ max Health magic damage over the duration, and Slow by an additional @EmpoweredSlow@.

components.name: Wingborne Storm (Awakened)
components.description:
Storm Stance: Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm for @BuffDuration@ seconds, dealing @StormDamage@ magic damage per second to nearby enemies and Slowing them by @SlowPotency@%. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks in this stance deal @PulseDamage@ magic damage to enemies in the storm.

Awaken: Unleash the storm, causing it to follow Udyr's last Attacked enemy, deal an additional @PercentHPBlast@ max Health magic damage over the duration, and Slow by an additional @EmpoweredSlow@.
